1.0.name: wordpress/orange-soda-keyword-density
1.0.description: The Plugin adds a box to posts and pages that shows the top 6 keywords from that post/page. Keyword density on posts and pages helps with search engine optimization and this tool will display the top words and their density. There is also a search box. If a word is not on the list, you can search for it and find the density of that word. You can also search for phrases. This is a plugin from OrangeSoda.
